energy_efficiency_source.notes: From Table 3, convert from primary COP target of 2.01 to COP by multiplying by 3.01, COP = BTU out/BTU in

source_data.title: Building Technologies Office Multi-Year Program Plan

installed_cost_source.notes: $22.9/kBtu/h cost premium + $12575/90kBtu/h = $139.7/kBtu/hr baseline; cost premium from BTO MYPP Table 3, baseline cost from average of typical and best total installed cost for 2020 in EIA equipment cost data for commercial rooftop air conditioners

source_data.title: Building Technologies Office Multi-Year Program Plan
Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies

product_lifetime_source.notes: Average lifetime for 'typical' 2020 column for commercial rooftop air conditioners

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies

market_scaling_fractions_source.heating: Applies to all commercial buildings with natural gas-fueled heating; commercial buildings with electric heating are excluded

cooling.title: CBECS 2012 - Table B30 -  Cooling energy sources, number of buildings and floorspace
cooling.fraction_derivation: Cooling multiple of 55.7% was determined as a proportion of commercial building square footage where heating is done using natural gas from CBECS 2012 microdata. Total commercial square footage with electric cooling in the sample was 73614 million ft^2; of those buildings, natural gas heating is used in 40980 million ft^2.

_description: Advanced vapor compression technology (AVCT) electric heating/cooling
